```{r}
library(tidyverse)
```

```{r}
layups <- read_csv("layups_2025-26.csv")
layups25 <- read_csv("layups_2024-25.csv")


bigten_layups <- layups |> 
  filter(team %in% c("Maryland", "Rutgers", "Iowa", "Michigan", "Michigan St.", "Ohio St.", "Penn St.", "Ucla", "Southern California", "Illinois", "Nebraska", "Purdue", "Indiana", "Northwestern", "Wisconsin", "Minnesota", "Washington", "Oregon", ""))

layups |> 
  group_by(team, action) |> 
  summarise(count = n()) |> 
  pivot_wider(names_from = action, values_from = count) |> 
  mutate(total = GOOD + MISS) |> 
  mutate(pct_miss = MISS/total) |> 
  arrange(desc(pct_miss))

```
